document.full_text: after a sluggish start to the season, the miami heat's all-star trio of lebron james, dwyane wade and chris bosh have silenced their critics and head into the playoffs among the favorites to win an nba title.
document.title: heat out to silence critics as playoffs begin
lines_and_colors: after a sluggish start to the season, the miami heat's all-star trio of lebron james, dwyane wade and chris bosh have silenced their critics and head into the playoffs among the favorites to win an nba title.
